vdelsmall.c File Reference

vdelsmall -- delete small components in a labelled image. More...

Detailed Description

vdelsmall -- delete small components in a labelled image.

Description
delete small components in a labelled image. The input image must be of type "ubyte" or "short". The output image will be of type "bit".
Usage
vdelsmall
Parameters:
-in  input image
-out  output image
-msize  Components of size less than <msize> are removed. Default: 10
Examples
Known bugs
none.

G.Lohmann, MPI-CBS, 2004
